questions.question: What is the main reason computers use binary to represent all data?
options: Binary numbers are easier for humans to read
Computers use logic gates that only understand ON and OFF states
Binary numbers are shorter than decimal numbers
questions.answer: Computers use logic gates that only understand ON and OFF states
